Module kivakit.component
Package com.telenav.kivakit.component

Class BaseComponent

java.lang.Object
com.telenav.kivakit.kernel.messaging.broadcasters.Multicaster
com.telenav.kivakit.kernel.messaging.repeaters.BaseRepeater
com.telenav.kivakit.component.BaseComponent
All Implemented Interfaces:
Component, RegistryTrait, SettingsTrait, Receiver, Transmitter, NamedObject, PackagePathTrait, TryTrait, Broadcaster, Listener, Repeater, Transceiver, ResourceTrait
Direct Known Subclasses:
Application
public class BaseComponent extends BaseRepeater implements Component, RegistryTrait, SettingsTrait
Base class for KivaKit components. Provides easy access to object registration and lookup (see Registry) as well as settings registration and lookup (see Settings). For details, see Component.
Author:
jonathanl (shibo)
See Also:
Component, Registry, Settings
